other_tests.findings: At baseline, the patient exhibited significantly increased functional connectivity between the medial prefrontal cortex and superior frontal gyrus, and between the anterior cingulate cortex and precuneus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Both differences were no longer detectable 200 minutes and 1 day after ketamine infusion, but altered SAN-precuneus connectivity was evident again after 7 days.

other_tests.findings: On admission, the patient had a BDI score of 54, indicating severe depression.
other_tests.changes_over_time: 65% reduction in BDI score 170 minutes after ketamine infusion.

other_tests.findings: On admission, the patient had a MADRS score of 43, indicating severe depression.
other_tests.changes_over_time: 73% reduction in MADRS score 50 minutes after ketamine infusion.

other_tests.findings: On admission, the patient's C-SSRS score was 21, indicating high suicidal ideation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: C-SSRS score dropped to 13, indicating a substantial reduction in suicidal ideation 200 minutes after ketamine infusion.

other_tests.findings: Dissociative symptoms peaked at a score of 24, suggesting significant dissociative experiences.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CADSS score decreased to 2 after 130 minutes.
